content.question: According to Source 2, which of the following best describes the number of Black officeholders during Reconstruction?

choices.label: Alabama and Louisiana had the largest number of Black officeholders during Reconstruction.
South Carolina and Mississippi had the largest number of Black officeholders during Reconstruction.
The number of Black officeholders prior to Reconstruction was more than the number of Black officeholders during Reconstruction.
Citizens in northern states elected more Black representatives to political office than citizens in southern states.

content.answer: South Carolina and Mississippi had the largest number of Black officeholders during Reconstruction.
